host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser une base de données Oracle}
{EN: Template to check Oracle Database}
host_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle

information.author: Centreon
information.changelog: * break: change threshold options for rman-backup-problems

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor Oracle DBMS using SQL request.
Several indicators are available but not linked to the template of host.
You have to use them manually:
* ASM-Diskgroup-Usage (by name or global)
* Connection-Number
* Connection-Time
* Corrupted-Blocks
* Data-Files-Status
* Datacache-Hitratio
* Dictionary-Cache-Usage
* Fra-Usage
* Event-Waits-Usage
* Library-Cache-Usage
* Process-Usage
* Redolog-Usage
* Rman-Backup-Age
* Rman-Backup-Online-Age
* Rman-Backup-Problems
* Session-Usage
* Tablespace-Usage
* Tnsping

Pack Plugin pour surveiller les SGBD Oracle en utilisant des requêtes SQL.
De nombreux indicateurs sont disponibles mais ne sont pas associés au modèle d\'hôte.
Ils doivent être déployés manuellement:
* ASM-Diskgroup-Usage (by name or global)
* Connection-Number
* Connection-Time
* Corrupted-Blocks
* Data-Files-Status
* Datacache-Hitratio
* Dictionary-Cache-Usage
* Fra-Usage
* Event-Waits-Usage
* Library-Cache-Usage
* Process-Usage
* Redolog-Usage
* Rman-Backup-Age
* Rman-Backup-Online-Age
* Rman-Backup-Problems
* Session-Usage
* Tablespace-Usage
* Tnsping

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install centreon-plugin-Applications-Databases-Oracle ## RPM In order to use this template, the following RPM is needed to compile Perl library: * gcc ### Oracle instant client Go to [Instant Client Downloads](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/database/features/instant-client/index-097480.html), choose the right OS (the one running monitoring engine, probably Linux x86-64) and download the following packages: * oracle-instantclient-basic * oracle-instantclient-sqlplus * oracle-instantclientdevel Install them: $ rpm -ivh oracle-*.rpm ### Perl library for oracle
Replace 12.1 by the version of instantclient installed
As root, run: $ cd /usr/local/src $ wget http://www.cpan.org/modules/by-module/DBD/DBD-Oracle-1.64.tar.gz $ tar xzf DBD-Oracle-1.64.tar.gz $ cd DBD-Oracle-1.64 $ export ORACLE_HOME=/usr/lib/oracle/12.1/client64/ $ export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$ORACLE_HOME/lib $ perl Makefile.PL -m /usr/share/oracle/12.1/client64/demo/demo.mk
If `DBD::Oracle-1.28` is used, the last command line should be:
$ perl Makefile.PL -V 12.1 The following message should appear: LD_RUN_PATH=/usr/lib/oracle/12.1/client64/lib* Using DBD::Oracle 1.64. Using DBD::Oracle 1.64. Using DBI 1.52 (for perl 5.008008 on x86_64-linux-thread-multi) installed in /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/5.8.8/x86\_64-linux-thread-multi/auto/DBI/ Writing Makefile for DBD::Oracle Compile the library: $ make Then install it: $ make install Then create the file : /etc/ld.so.conf.d/oracle.conf and link to the Oracle Perl Library: $ touch /etc/ld.so.conf.d/oracle.conf $ vi /etc/ld.so.conf.d/oracle.conf You just have to enter in the file : /usr/lib/oracle/12.1/client64/lib/ Then : /sbin/ldconfig ### user account The safest way to retrieve information from the Oracle server is to create a dedicated user for Centreon. This user account must have the read permission on following tables: - dba\_free\_space - dba\_data\_files - dba\_temp\_files - dba\_segments - dba\_jobs - v$sysstat - v$sgastat - v$parameter - v$process - v$session - v$filestat - v$log - v$instance ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a new Oracle server Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

App-DB-Oracle-custom
Click on the *Save* button. Those services were automatically created for this host:
Service Description

ping

Monitor host response time

Connection-Number

Check connection number to the Oracle server

Connection-Time

Check the time to connect to the server

Corrupted-Blocks

Check the number of corrupted blocks in database

Datacache-Hitratio

Check the 'Data Buffer Cache Hit Ratio' of the server.

Tablespace-Usage

Check the used space in tablespaces

Rman-Backup-Problems

Check RMAN backup errors of the server during the last three days

Tnsping

Check the connection to a remote listener
### Host macro configuration The following macros must be configured on host:
Macro Description Default value Example

ORACLEPORT

Port used to connect to the DB server

1521

1521

ORACLESID

The name of the oracle instance

SID

ORCLB55

ORACLEUSERNAME

the oracle user

USERNAME

root

ORACLEPASSWORD

the oracle user's password

PASSWORD

p@ssw0rd
information.name: Oracle Database

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la connexion à un 'listener' distant.}

{EN: Check the connection to a remote listener.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Tnsping

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des 'tablespaces' du serveur.}

{EN: Check the tablespace usage of the server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Tablespace-Usage-Global

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des sessions.}

{EN: Check session used.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Session-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les erreurs de sauvegarde 'RMAN' du serveur durant les 3 derniers jours.}

{EN: Check RMAN backup errors of the server during the last three days.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Rman-Backup-Problems

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des 'process' Oracle.}

{EN: Check Oracle process used.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Process-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le 'Data Buffer Cache Hit Ratio' du serveur. Aucunes alertes par défaut.}

{EN: Check the 'Data Buffer Cache Hit Ratio' of the server. No alerts by default.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Datacache-Hitratio

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le nombre de blocks corrompus du serveur. }

{EN: Check the number of corrupted blocks on the server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Corrupted-Blocks

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la durée de connexion au serveur. Ce temps est donné en secondes.}

{EN: Check the connection time to the server. This time is given in seconds.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Connection-Time

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le nombre de connexions au serveur Oracle.}

{EN: Check connection number to the Oracle server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Connection-Number

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation et le statut des groupes de disques ASM sur un serveur Oracle.}

{EN: Check ASM groupdisk usage and status to the Oracle server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-ASM-Diskgroup-Usage-Generic-Name

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation et le statut des groupes de disques ASM sur un serveur Oracle.}

{EN: Check ASM groupdisk usage and status to the Oracle server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-ASM-Diskgroup-Usage-Global

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le statut des fichiers de données Oracle.}

{EN: Check Oracle data files status.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Data-Files-Status

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'ancienneté des sauvegardes 'RMAN'.}

{EN: Check RMAN backup age.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Rman-Backup-Age

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'ancienneté des sauvegardes 'RMAN' en mode online.}

{EN: Check RMAN backup age in online mode.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Rman-Backup-Online-Age

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant d'exécuter une requête SQL personnalisée renvoyant une donnée numérique.}

{EN: Check allowing to execute a custom SQL request with a digital answer.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Sql-Statement-Generic

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des 'event waits'. }
{EN: Check event wait usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Event-Waits-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des 'rollback segment'. }
{EN: Check rollback segment usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Rollback-Segment-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les longues requêtes. }
{EN: Check long queries.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Long-Queries

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des objets invalides. }
{EN: Check invalid objects.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Invalid-Object

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant d'exécuter une requête SQL personnalisée renvoyant une chaine de caractères.}

{EN: Check allowing to execute a custom SQL request with a string answer.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Sql-Statement-String-Generic

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le 'dictionary cache'.}

{EN: Check dictionary cache usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Dictionary-Cache-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le 'fast recovery area space'.}

{EN: Check fast recovery area space usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Fra-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le 'library cache'.}

{EN: Check library cache usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Library-Cache-Usage

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le 'redo log'.}

{EN: Check redo log usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Oracle-Redolog-Usage
